Tibia.Objects.ItemLocation

Tibia.Objects.ItemLocation Class Reference

Represents an item's location in game/memory. Can be either a slot, an inventory location, or on the ground. More...

Detailed Description

Represents an item's location in game/memory. Can be either a slot, an inventory location, or on the ground.
